issue.title: www.bing.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.bing.com/search?q=what+was+australian+minimum+wage+in+1901&qs=n&form=QBRE&sp=-1&ghc=1&lq=0&pq=what+was+australian+minimum+wage+in+1901&sc=12-40&sk=&cvid=4E349F9732E0441E97C3731A3B158BA4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dwhat%2Bwas%2Baustralian%2Bminimum%2Bwage%2Bin%2B1901%26qs%3Dn%26form%3DQBRE%26sp%3D-1%26ghc%3D1%26lq%3D0%26pq%3Dwhat%2Bwas%2Baustralian%2Bminimum%2Bwage%2Bin%2B1901%26sc%3D12-40%26sk%3D%26cvid%3D4E349F9732E0441E97C3731A3B158BA4) ### Comment > A sponsored website was shown in microsoft bing. This is not he first time I have seen it, but it seems to only show occasionally. For this one, I have searched up 'what was australian minimum wage in 1901', and it came up with fairworkhelp.com first as a sponsored website. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/s9xkf57sw68k0kcc40oooowkkk08wkon1wju9vlc40.png?nc=1)
